location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Copy of letter No 1647/454 of 1872 from Colonel Lewis Pelly, HBM's Political Resident in the Persian Gulf, to The Secretary to Government, Political Department, Bombay

mods.abstract: Letter enclosing a copy of a letter received from the Governor of Mohumurah [Khorramshahr] regarding the Coal mines in the Bakhtiari hills and reporting that he has taken no further action with regards to the question of Persian Coal owing to his understanding that Baron Reuter had been granted a concession by the Persian Government in regard to the coal mines of His Majesty's (Shah of Persia) dominions.The enclosure referred to is not enclosed in the file.
